## FWidthNode class

Computes the sum of absolute derivatives

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FWidthNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns abs(dpdx(x)) + abs(dpdy(x)), representing the total rate of change across both screen axes. Useful for automatic LOD calculation and edge detection. Only available in fragment shaders. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
